Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

HREDBOOK

The basic type HREDBOOK is a handle to a CD audio (redbook) device.

Discussion

HREDBOOK handles are returned from the AIL_redbook_open function.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AIL_redbook_close, AIL_redbook_eject, AIL_redbook_id, AIL_redbook_open, AIL_redbook_open_drive, AIL_redbook_open_volume, AIL_redbook_pause, AIL_redbook_play, AIL_redbook_position, AIL_redbook_resume, AIL_redbook_retract, AIL_redbook_set_volume_level, AIL_redbook_status, AIL_redbook_stop, AIL_redbook_track, AIL_redbook_track_info, AIL_redbook_tracks, AIL_redbook_volume_level
